name: graphql-config
description: The easiest way to configure your development environment with your GraphQL schema (supported by most tools, editors & IDEs)

1.0.0-rc.0.name: graphql-config
1.0.0-rc.0.description: The easiest way to configure your development environment with your GraphQL schema (supported by most tools, editors & IDEs)

scripts.test-only: npm run build && npm run copy-test-assets && ava --verbose lib/__tests__/**/*.js --serial
